Epictetus junior, or, Maximes of modern morality in two centuries / collected by J.D. of Kidwelly. Maximes. English La Rochefoucauld, François, duc de, 1613-1680. Davies, John, 1625-1693.
[11], 137, [6] p.
Printed for T. Bassett ..., London : 1670.
Attributed to Franco̧is La Rochefoucauld. Cf. Wing (2nd ed.). Collected and translated by John Davies. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). Licensed Nov. 8, 1669. Roger L'Estrange--P. [1]. Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
